text: Mario Altmann (born November 4, 1986 in Vienna) is an Austrian ice hockey player who was participating at the 2011 IIHF World Championship as a member of the Austria men's national ice hockey team. ==References== * * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Austrian ice hockey players Category:Ice hockey defencemen Category:Sportspeople from Vienna Category:Swedish Hockey League players
title: Mario Altmann
